summary:
Prep Time: 15 minutes
Cook Time: 20 minutes
Servings: 4
Ingredients:

2 small uncooked chicken breasts
3. 5 cups chicken stock (low sodium)
2. 5oz of uncooked lean smoked back bacon (fat removed), diced small
1 shallot, finely diced
2 cloves of garlic, minced
½ cup of 2% milk
½ tbsp lemon juice
175g of laughing cow light (or can use light cream cheese)
½ tbsp of cornstarch
1 tsp of dried parsley​
1 tsp of dried chives
1 tsp of onion powder
½ tsp of dried dill
½ tsp of garlic powder
17...
title: 🍗 Creamy Crack Chicken Gnocchi
